questionTitle: He opened the letter without ________ to read the address on the envelope.
Fay: The headmistress wants you in her study. Ivy: She's here already. I didn't think she ________ till tomorrow.
If you have any ________ concerning this report please telephone the Planning Office.
Could you please ________ exactly what you saw?
Look, Mother! James has brought you a ________ of flowers.
She gets very angry with her son because he seems to be incapable ________ keeping his room tidy.
In the summer we often sleep in the ________ air on our terrace.
What a beautiful dress! It ________ you perfectly.
I bought the hat because the colours ________ the colours of the coat.
To promote him so quickly you must have a very high ________ of his ability.
It's no use waiting for him any longer. We ________ as well go without him.
He ________ out of the window for a moment and then went on working.
You should always keep receipts from shops as proof ________ purchase.
Please don't mention it ________ my husband, but I paid $10 for this hat.
I knocked ________ the door.
You must have ________ the examination before Friday, so bring your money to the office as soon as possible.
They ________ for you for more than two hours now.
I would have come home earlier if you ________ me to help you with the housework.
Petrol in this country is so expensive ________ we use public transport as much as possible.
There has been some ________ in the relations between those two countries recently.
